languages.text: Отдых и качественное питание, предписанные Лорд-капитаном, помогают астропатам тверже встречать козни варпа.
A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.
languages.original_text: Отдых и качественное питание, предписанные Лорд-капитаном, помогают астропатам тверже встречать козни варпа.

traits.locale_text: Some rest and good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

languages.text: Ein wenig Ruhe und eine vom Lord Captain autorisierte Mahlzeit haben hinsichtlich des Kampfes der Astropathen gegen die Umtriebe des Warps einen großen Unterschied gemacht.
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

traits.locale_text: Ein wenig Ruhe und eine vom Lord Captain autorisierte Mahlzeit haben hinsichtlich des Kampfes der Astropathen gegen die Umtriebe des Warps einen großen Unterschied gemacht.

languages.text: Grâce au repos et au bon repas accordés par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, les astropathes sont plus aptes à lutter contre les machinations du Warp.
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

traits.locale_text: Grâce au repos et au bon repas accordés par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, les astropathes sont plus aptes à lutter contre les machinations du Warp.

languages.text: Con un poco de descanso y buena comida, autorizados por su Lord Capitán, la lucha de los Astrópatas contra las maquinaciones de la disformidad ha mejorado considerablemente.
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

traits.locale_text: Con un poco de descanso y buena comida, autorizados por su Lord Capitán, la lucha de los Astrópatas contra las maquinaciones de la disformidad ha mejorado considerablemente.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン公認のちょっとした休息とおいしい食事が、<歪み>の策略に対抗する感応通信官の闘志に大きな変化を齎した。
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン公認のちょっとした休息とおいしい食事が、<歪み>の策略に対抗する感応通信官の闘志に大きな変化を齎した。

languages.text: 在领主舰长的授意下，星语者们稍事休息，补充了些营养，可以更加专注地对抗亚空间中的邪恶之物。
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.

traits.locale_text: 在领主舰长的授意下，星语者们稍事休息，补充了些营养，可以更加专注地对抗亚空间中的邪恶之物。

languages.text: Biraz dinlenmenin üstüne Lord Kaptan'ın izniyle güzel bir şeyler yemek, öteboyutun entrikaları karşısında Astropatların çektikleri zorluğu bir hayli rahatlatıyor.
languages.original_text: A bit of rest and some good food authorised by the Lord Captain have made a great difference in the Astropaths' struggle against the warp's machinations.
